page.title: 09MEALS
page.content: {Karen Waring age 10} My favourite meal is chips and beans.Chips are potatoes chopped up.Beans are made from a plant and then put into a sauce .The meals of the day are:(a){breakfast}in the morning when you get up.Breakfast is cornflakes with milk and sugar or another kind of breakfast.(b)What I have for {lunch}is sandwiches and an apple and chocolate bar.Sandwiches are bread with jam or something else inside.My favourite lunch is ham sandwiches.(c)The next meal of the day is {dinner.}I sometimes have peas,ham and chips.Peas are from a pea pod of the plant.(d)The last meal is{supper.} I have cake or something else.My favourite meal of the day is lunch and my favourite fruit is peaches and I get our food from Gateway and town.
